seniority_level.evidence: 5 years minimum experience with responsibilities for building, maintaining and optimizing scalable data pipelines suggests senior level despite title not having 'Senior'

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer with core focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT processes, and data platform engineering

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on ETL/ELT processes, data pipelines, and batch processing with mention of real-time as secondary

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team leadership, or mentoring responsibilities - focus on individual contribution to data engineering team

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Azure, and GCP all listed as must-have skills with equal emphasis, indicating multi-cloud approach

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary cloud is multi, no additional secondary clouds to list

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions both 'real-time streaming data pipelines and batch data processing' as core responsibilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as nice-to-have skill for data orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions data lakes for structured and unstructured data, cloud storage solutions like S3, with focus on raw data processing patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: No remote work model mentioned and location specified as Bengaluru, India, but no clear restriction type stated

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Bengaluru, Karnataka, India with no global or multi-timezone team mentions

relocation_required.evidence: Position is already located in Bengaluru with no mention of relocation requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and this is an Indian company position, H1B sponsorship not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support or OPT/CPT acceptance, work authorization requirements not specified

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization restrictions mentioned, suggesting all statuses accepted

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No contract type or employment structure mentioned, appears to be standard full-time position but not explicitly stated

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career path, growth opportunities, or advancement discussions mentioned in the posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or working with senior engineers mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression paths mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Databricks required) and nice-to-have skills (Airflow, Kafka optional), balanced requirement structure

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description on data engineering with well-defined responsibilities for data pipelines, ETL processes, and platform work

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5 years experience requirement is appropriate for senior data engineer role, skills mentioned are realistic and relevant
